body_html: @devilsnare007: I guess the best chances are by following https://github.com/philferriere/dlwin. Simply replace the listed versions with the current versions. Note, that TF 1.4 has not even been released. But TF 1.3 should work fine with the instructions provided. Once everything has been upgraded and TF 1.4 has been released, we will update that tutorial.
